scripts.say: These damned Sirens! How were they allowed to get this far?
That's just how they operate, seemingly emerging out of nowhere. If they weren't so slippery, humanity wouldn't have been pushed to the brink.
Whatever, just be quiet and focus on the mission! We're here to fight Sirens, not to philosophize!
I'm just assessing the status quo. It goes without saying that the enemy... shall be annihilated.
I... I'm glad you two are getting along well!
I am very sorry for interrupting! ... But, enemy reinforcements are approaching!
Open fire, everyone! Don't let those Siren bastards advance a step farther!
